# Multi-scale Analysis with spacelink

This vignette demonstrates how to perform multi-scale spatial gene expression analysis.

## Length Scale Selection

spacelink automatically selects optimal length scales, but you can also specify custom scales:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# Custom length scales
custom_scales <- c(10, 50, 100, 200, 500)

results <- spacelink_global(
  Y = expression_matrix,
  spatial_coords = coordinates,
  lengthscales = custom_scales
)
```
